mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.user_id, a.nickname, a.region_code, a.start_at, a.end_at, a.thumbnail, a.status, a.title, a.content, a.member_cnt, a.hashtag, a.view_cnt, a.acmp_board_status, a.report_cnt, a.chat_url, a.applicant_cnt, a.deleted_at, a.created_at, a.created_by, a.updated_at, a.updated_by, c.city_name FROM accompany AS a LEFT JOIN city_code AS c ON a.region_code = c.region_code WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{sc.offset}, #{sc.pageSize};

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO accompany (user_id, nickname, profile_img, region_code, start_at, end_at, thumbnail, title, content, member_cnt, hashtag, chat_url, created_at, created_by) VALUES(#{userId}, #{nickname}, #{profileImg}, #{regionCode}, #{startAt}, #{endAt}, #{thumbnail}, #{title}, #{content}, #{memberCnt}, #{hashtag}, #{chatUrl}, now(), #{createdBy})
